tool_description: Schedules and manages multi-stage recovery campaigns for abandoned carts, including timing optimization and channel selection.

abandonment_event_id.description: Unique identifier for the abandonment event

user_segment.description: User segment: new_customer, returning_customer, vip_customer, price_sensitive

abandonment_stage.description: Stage of abandonment: cart, shipping, payment, review

timezone.description: User's timezone for optimal send times

campaign_type.description: Type of campaign: standard, aggressive, gentle

error_messages: Invalid user_id: Must be a non-empty string
Invalid abandonment_event_id: Must be a non-empty string
Invalid user_segment: Must be one of [new_customer, returning_customer, vip_customer, price_sensitive]
Invalid cart_value: Must be a positive number
Invalid abandonment_stage: Must be one of [cart, shipping, payment, review]
Invalid preferred_channels: Must contain valid channels [email, sms, push_notification, retargeting]
Invalid timezone: Must be a valid timezone identifier
Invalid campaign_type: Must be one of [standard, aggressive, gentle]
Invalid max_attempts: Must be between 1 and 5
usage: Call after abandonment detection to schedule recovery campaigns. Provide user details, abandonment context, and campaign preferences to create optimized recovery sequences.

campaign_id.description: Unique identifier for the scheduled campaign
